name: trend-micro-cloud-app-security
label: Trend Micro Cloud App Security
description: Trend Micro Cloud App Security provides advanced protection for the following cloud applications and services to enhance security with powerful enterprise-class threat and data protection control: Microsoft Office 365 services (Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, OneDrive, Microsoft Teams), Box, Dropbox, and Google Workspace (Google Drive, Gmail).Cloud App Security provides protection against ransomware, phishing, Business Email Compromise (BEC), zero-day and hidden malware, and unauthorized transmission of sensitive data. It integrates cloud-to-cloud with the protected applications and services to maintain high availability and administrative functionality.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL of the Trend Micro Cloud App Security server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations. The server URL is subject to the site where your Cloud App Security service is hosted for more information please refer https://docs.trendmicro.com/en-us/enterprise/cloud-app-security-integration-api-online-help/getting-started-with/understanding-the-ur.aspx
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Authentication Token
fields.description: Specify the Authentication Token used to access the Trend Micro Cloud App Security APIs and perform automated operations.For information regarding token generation please refer https://docs.trendmicro.com/en-us/enterprise/cloud-app-security-integration-api-online-help/getting-started-with/generating-an-authen.aspx
fields.name: token

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Security Logs
operations.description: Retrieves security event logs of the services that Cloud App Security protects.

parameters.title: Service
parameters.description: Select the name of the protected service whose logs you want to retrieve.
parameters.name: service

parameters.title: Event
parameters.description: Select the security event whose logs you want to retrieve.
parameters.name: event

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.description: Specify the start date during which logs are to retrieve. The request retrieves logs within a maximum of 72 hours before the point of time when the request is sent according to the start and end settings: If both start and end are not specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of time when the request is sent. If both start and end are specified, the request retrieves logs within the configured duration. Make sure the end time is no earlier than the start time. If only start is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of the configured end time.
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.description: Specify the end date during which logs are to retrieve. The request retrieves logs within a maximum of 72 hours before the point of time when the request is sent according to the start and end settings: If both start and end are not specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of time when the request is sent. If both start and end are specified, the request retrieves logs within the configured duration. Make sure the end time is no earlier than the start time. If only start is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of the configured end time.
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Number Of Logs To Retrieve
parameters.description: Number of log items to display at a time. A maximum of 500 log items are allowed.If not specified, the value is set to 500 by default.
parameters.tooltip: Number of log items to display at a time. A maximum of 500 log items are allowed.If not specified, the value is set to 500 by default.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.title: Get All Pages
parameters.name: get_all_pages
parameters.tooltip: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.
parameters.description: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.

operations.title: Get Virtual Analyzer Report
operations.description: Retrieves the summary report generated by Virtual Analyzer.

parameters.title: Report ID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Virtual Analyzer report contained in the va_report_link field returned by the Get Security Log API.
parameters.name: report_id

operations.title: Get Quarantine Events
operations.description: Retrieves quarantine events of the services that Cloud App Security protects.

parameters.title: Service
parameters.description: Name of the protected service whose quarantine events you want to retrieve.Currently, the value must be exchange.
parameters.name: service

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.description: Specify the start date during which quarantine events are to retrieve. The request retrieves quarantine evens within a maximum of 7 days before the point of time when the request is sent according to the start and end settings: If both start and end are not specified, the request retrieves quarantine events within one day before the point of time when the request is sent. If both start and end are specified, the request retrieves quarantine events within the configured duration. Make sure the end time is no earlier than the start time. If only start is specified, the request retrieves quarantine events within one day after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request retrieves quarantine events within one day before the point of the configured end time.
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.description: Specify the end date during which quarantine events are to retrieve. The request retrieves quarantine evens within a maximum of 7 days before the point of time when the request is sent according to the start and end settings: If both start and end are not specified, the request retrieves quarantine events within one day before the point of time when the request is sent. If both start and end are specified, the request retrieves quarantine events within the configured duration. Make sure the end time is no earlier than the start time. If only start is specified, the request retrieves quarantine events within one day after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request retrieves quarantine events within one day before the point of the configured end time.
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Number Of Quarantine Events To Retrieve
parameters.description: Number of quarantine events to display at a time. A maximum of 500 log items are allowed.If not specified, the value is set to 500 by default.
parameters.tooltip: Number of quarantine events to display at a time. A maximum of 500 log items are allowed.If not specified, the value is set to 500 by default.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.title: Get All Pages
parameters.name: get_all_pages
parameters.tooltip: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.
parameters.description: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.

operations.title: Get Email
operations.description: Searches email messages in Cloud App Security protected mailboxes for those that match meta information search criteria.

parameters.title: Mailbox
parameters.description: Email address of the mailbox to search in Type a complete email address. Non-prefix wildcard is supported. Example: u*ser@example.com or user@ex*ample.com
parameters.name: mailbox

parameters.title: Last N Days
parameters.description: Number of days (n × 24 hours) before the point of time when the request is sent, during which email messages are to search Cloud App Security saves the meta information of email messages in each mailbox for 90 days. Do not configure lastndays and start/end at the same time.
parameters.name: lastndays

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.description: Specify the start date during which email message are to search. Cloud App Security saves the meta information of email messages for 90 days. The request searches email messages according to the start and end settings: If both start and end are not specified, the request searches email messages within seven days (7 × 24 hours) before the point of time when the request is sent. If both start and end are specified, the request searches email messages within the configured duration. Make sure the end time is no earlier than the start time. If only start is specified, the request searches email messages within seven days (7 × 24 hours) after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request searches email messages within seven days (7 × 24 hours) before the point of the configured end time. Do not configure lastndays and start/end at the same time.
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.description: Specify the end date during which email message are to search. Cloud App Security saves the meta information of email messages for 90 days. The request searches email messages according to the start and end settings: If both start and end are not specified, the request searches email messages within seven days (7 × 24 hours) before the point of time when the request is sent. If both start and end are specified, the request searches email messages within the configured duration. Make sure the end time is no earlier than the start time. If only start is specified, the request searches email messages within seven days (7 × 24 hours) after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request searches email messages within seven days (7 × 24 hours) before the point of the configured end time. Do not configure lastndays and start/end at the same time.
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Subject
parameters.description: Subject of email messages to search for
parameters.name: subject

parameters.title: File SHA1
parameters.description: SHA-1 hash value of the attachment file to search for Cloud App Security uses exact match. Type a complete and valid SHA-1 hash value.
parameters.name: file_sha1

parameters.title: File SHA256
parameters.description: SHA-256 hash value of the attachment file to search for Cloud App Security uses exact match. Type a complete and valid SHA-256 hash value.
parameters.name: file_sha256

parameters.title: File Name
parameters.description: Name of the attachment file to search for Type the file name you want to search for, with or without a filename extension. Non-prefix wildcard is supported. Example: ex*ample
parameters.name: file_name

parameters.title: File Extension
parameters.description: Filename extension of attachment files to search for Type the filename extension you want to search for, without a dot '.' Non-prefix wildcard is supported. Example: do*
parameters.name: file_extension

parameters.title: URL
parameters.description: URL in email body or attachments to search for
parameters.name: url

parameters.title: Sender
parameters.description: Sender email address of email messages to search for Type a complete email address. Non-prefix wildcard is supported. Example: u*ser@example.com
parameters.name: sender

parameters.title: Recipient
parameters.description: Recipient email address of email messages to search for Type a complete email address. Non-prefix wildcard is supported. Example: u*ser@example.com
parameters.name: recipient

parameters.title: Message ID
parameters.description: Internet message ID of the email message to search for It can be obtained from Microsoft Graph API or EWS API.
parameters.name: message_id

parameters.title: Source IP
parameters.description: Source IP address of email messages to search for An IP address with or without subnet mask is supported. Example: xx.yy.zz.ww or xx.yy.zz.ww/16
parameters.name: source_ip

parameters.title: Source Domain
parameters.description: Source domain of email messages to search for Type a complete domain name. Non-prefix wildcard is supported. Example:ex*ample.com
parameters.name: source_domain

parameters.title: Number Of Email Messages To Retrieve
parameters.description: Number of email messages whose meta information is to display at a time. A maximum of 1,000 email messages are allowed. If not specified, the value is set to 20 by default.
parameters.tooltip: Number of email messages whose meta information is to display at a time. A maximum of 1,000 email messages are allowed. If not specified, the value is set to 20 by default.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.title: Get All Pages
parameters.name: get_all_pages
parameters.tooltip: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.
parameters.description: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.

operations.title: Take Action On User
operations.description: Takes actions on a specified user accounts, including disabling a user account, requesting to enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) for a user account, requesting to reset password for a user account, and terminating all sign-in sessions of Microsoft services for a user account.

parameters.title: Action Type
parameters.description: Action to take on a user account.
parameters.name: action_type

parameters.title: Service
parameters.description: Name of the protected service to which the API applies. Options include: exchange
parameters.name: service

parameters.title: Account Provider
parameters.description: Provider of the protected service. Options include: office365
parameters.name: account_provider

parameters.title: Account User Email
parameters.description: Email address used to create the user account
parameters.name: account_user_email

operations.title: Take Action On Email
operations.description: Takes actions on a specified email messages, including deleting an email message, quarantining an email message, and restoring a quarantined email message.

parameters.title: Action Type
parameters.description: Action to take on a user account.For Gmail, only MAIL DELETE is supported. The MAIL RESTORE action is supported only for Exchange Online.
parameters.name: action_type

parameters.title: Service
parameters.description: Name of the protected service to which the API applies.
parameters.name: service

parameters.title: Account Provider
parameters.description: Provider of the protected service.
parameters.name: account_provider

parameters.title: Mail Box
parameters.description: Email address of an email message to take action on
parameters.name: mailbox

parameters.title: Mail Message Id
parameters.description: Internet message ID of an email message to take action on It can be obtained from the Get Email or Get Quarantine Events API of Cloud App Security or the Microsoft Graph API.
parameters.name: mail_message_id

parameters.title: Mail Unique Id
parameters.description: Unique ID of an email message to take action on It can be obtained from the Get Email or Get Quarantine Events API of Cloud App Security or the Microsoft Graph API.
parameters.name: mail_unique_id

parameters.title: Mail Message Delivery Time
parameters.description: Date and time when an email message to take action on is sent It can be obtained from the Get Email or Get Quarantine Events API of Cloud App Security or the Microsoft Graph API or EWS API.
parameters.name: mail_message_delivery_time

parameters.title: Detection Time
parameters.description: Date and time when the security event was detected It applies only to the MAIL_RESTORE action and can be obtained from the Cloud App Security Get Quarantine Events API.
parameters.name: detection_time

parameters.title: Mail Log Id
parameters.description: ID that uniquely identifies a log item It applies only to the MAIL_RESTORE action and can be obtained from the Cloud App Security Get Quarantine Events API.
parameters.name: mail_log_id

operations.title: Get User Action Result
operations.description: Queries the results of actions on specified user accounts

parameters.title: Batch ID
parameters.description: Unique ID of a Threat Mitigation request To query actions taken within a single request, use this parameter.
parameters.name: batch_id

parameters.title: Start Date
parameters.description: Start time during which action results are to retrieve. The request retrieves logs within a maximum of 72 hours before the point of time when the request is sent according to the start and end settings: If both start and end are not specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of time when the request is sent. If both start and end are specified, the request retrieves logs within the configured duration. Make sure the end time is no earlier than the start time. If only start is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of the configured end time.
parameters.name: start

parameters.title: End Date
parameters.description: End time during which action results are to retrieve. The request retrieves logs within a maximum of 72 hours before the point of time when the request is sent according to the start and end settings: If both start and end are not specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of time when the request is sent. If both start and end are specified, the request retrieves logs within the configured duration. Make sure the end time is no earlier than the start time. If only start is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of the configured end time.
parameters.name: end

parameters.title: Number Of Action Results To Retrieve
parameters.description: Number of Action Results to display at a time. A maximum of 500 are allowed If not specified, the value is set to 500 by default.
parameters.tooltip: Number of Action Results to display at a time. A maximum of 500 are allowed If not specified, the value is set to 500 by default..
parameters.name: limit

parameters.title: Get All Pages
parameters.name: get_all_pages
parameters.tooltip: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.
parameters.description: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.

parameters.title: Start Date

If only start is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes after the point of the configured start time. If only end is specified, the request retrieves logs within five minutes before the point of the configured end time.

parameters.title: Number Of Action Results To Retrieve
parameters.description: Number of Action Results to display at a time. A maximum of 500 are allowed If not specified, the value is set to 500 by default.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.tooltip: If you select this option, i.e., set it to true, all pages will be fetched so the action will return all available records.

operations.title: Get Blocked List
operations.description: Retrieves all blocked senders, URLs, SHA-1 hash values, and SHA-256 hash values that the administrator has configured through this API on Cloud App Security to quarantine Exchange Online email messages.

operations.title: Update Blocked List
operations.description: Adds or removes senders, URLs, SHA-1 hash values, and/or SHA-256 hash values to or from the blocked lists on Cloud App Security.

parameters.title: Action Type
parameters.description: Add one or multiple email senders, URLs, SHA-1 hash values, and SHA-256 hash values to or remove them from the blocked lists.
parameters.name: action_type

parameters.title: Senders
parameters.description: A csv of sending email addresses
parameters.name: senders

parameters.title: URL's
parameters.description: A csv of URLs included in email messages
parameters.name: urls

parameters.title: File Hashes
parameters.description: A csv of SHA-1 hash values of email attachments
parameters.name: filehashes

parameters.title: File SHA-256 Hashes
parameters.description: A csv of SHA-256 hash values of email attachments
parameters.name: file256hashes
